org.pepstock.charba.client.zoom

Class JsZoomHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.zoom.JsZoomHelper

  • final class JsZoomHelper
extends Object
    Internal utility of ZoomPlugin to reset zooming.
    This is done a native javascript object because the plugin adds a function to original CHART.JS chart instance.
    To maintain Chart clean from custom functions and properties, this helper has benn implemented.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • resetZoom

        void resetZoom(Chart chart,
               TransitionKey transition)
        Reset the zoom of chart when ZoomPlugin is activated.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance to invoke
        transition - update transition mode, could be null

      • zoomScale

        void zoomScale(Chart chart,
               ScaleId scaleId,
               ScaleRange range,
               TransitionKey transition)
        Zooms the chart scale on demand, programmatically.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance to invoke
        scaleId - scale id to zoom
        range - range (min/max) of scale to zoom
        transition - update transition mode
